alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Kingfisher (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 7:44AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Kingfisher, southwestern Noble, northwestern Logan, west central Payne and southeastern Garfield Counties through 815 AM CDT... At 744 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Douglas, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Perry, Covington, Marshall, Orlando, Douglas, Lake Carl Blackwell, Lake Mcmurtry, Lucien, and Hayward. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 174 and 194. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
